name: minijasminenode-relaunchable
description: Experimental hack on minijasminenode v1.1.1 by Julie Ralph ju.ralph@gmail.com, used by package protractor-relaunchable used by package asyncshell http://github.com/carrascoMDD/asyncshell, part of protractor v1.3.1, to reset state kept in certain properties, such that it allows relaunching protractor multiple times within the same NodeJS operating system process.
